priorVersion.title: CDISC Functional Test ERT Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C150768

self.title: CDISC Functional Test ERT Test Code Terminology

name: Emotion Recognition Functional Test Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Functional Test ERT Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Emotion Recognition Functional Test Test Code

terms.definition: Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) expected to be administered in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) actually administered in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) actually completed in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) for which the participant's response was correct.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) for which the participant's response was incorrect.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of stimuli (face images) for which the participant has not responded.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) expected to be administered in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) actually administered in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) actually completed in the task.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) for which the participant's response was correct.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) for which the participant's response was incorrect.
Emotion Recognition - Total number of negative emotion stimuli (face images) for which the participant has not responded.
terms.preferredTerm: ERT - Total Negative Stimuli Not Respond
